definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Conclusions Thrush was well prevented with 2% sodium bicarbonate.
sentences.chinese: 结论2%碳酸氢钠清洗口腔可预防鹅口疮。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of prevention of thrush by oral nursing with 2%sodium bicarbonate.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察2%碳酸氢钠清洗口腔预防鹅口疮的效果。

sentences.english: Do not give patient any baking soda or emetics.
sentences.chinese: 禁止给病人碳酸氢钠或催吐剂。

sentences.english: Preliminary study on desulfurization by sodium bicarbonate and discussion of its optimum condition;
sentences.chinese: 目的研究碳酸氢钠溶液对人牙釉质抗酸性的影响。

sentences.english: Sodium bicarbonate sitz baths and topical vegetable oils may provide some local relief.
sentences.chinese: 碳酸氢钠坐浴和局部外涂植物油可缓解症状。

sentences.english: Most likely a bit of bicarb too to soften it up.
sentences.chinese: 很可能加过一点碳酸氢钠让它变软。

sentences.english: High regenerative temperature is helpful for sodium bicarbonatechange into sodium carbonate.
sentences.chinese: 再生温度高有利于碳酸氢钠转变为碳酸钠。

sentences.english: This modest amount of sodium bicarbonate prevents the potassium depletion and demineralization of bone.
sentences.chinese: 这点碳酸氢钠量即可防止缺钾和骨质脱钙。

sentences.english: Conclusion The oral cavity fungal infection was well prevented by NaHCO3 saline.
sentences.chinese: 结论碳酸氢钠盐水含漱能够预防口腔真菌感染。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE The technology of manufacture of sodium bicarbonate tablets by wet mixing granulation was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究以湿法混合制粒法制备碳酸氢钠片的工艺。

sentences.english: Synthesis of isoamyi propionate catalyzed by sodium hydrogen sulfate under microwave irradiation;
sentences.chinese: 目的研究碳酸氢钠溶液对人牙釉质抗酸性的影响。

sentences.english: The equilibrium conversion decreases as the initial concentration of bicarbonate increases.
sentences.chinese: 苛化时随碳酸氢钠初始浓度增大，平衡苛化率下降。

sentences.english: Western medicine used pancreatin and sodium bicarbonate orally.
sentences.chinese: 西药采用胰酶和碳酸氢钠口服。
